tool_description: Creates customized budget templates and frameworks based on grant requirements and project specifications, with cost category suggestions and validation.

grant_id.description: Grant opportunity identifier to generate budget template for

project_type.description: Type of project (research, service, education, infrastructure, capacity building)

total_budget.description: Total project budget amount in USD

organization_type.description: Type of organization (nonprofit, academic, government, for-profit)

staff_positions.description: Key staff positions for the project

indirect_rate.description: Organization's indirect cost rate as percentage (0-50)

cost_share_required.description: Whether grant requires matching funds or cost share

multi_year.description: Whether to create multi-year budget breakdown

error_messages: Grant not found: The specified grant_id does not exist in the database.
Invalid project type: Must be one of 'research', 'service', 'education', 'infrastructure', 'capacity building'.
Invalid budget amount: total_budget must be a positive integer.
Invalid duration: project_duration_months must be between 1 and 60.
Invalid organization type: Must be one of 'nonprofit', 'academic', 'government', 'for-profit'.
Invalid indirect rate: If provided, indirect_rate must be between 0 and 50.
Budget template generation failed: Unable to create template with provided parameters.
usage: Provide grant_id, project_type, total_budget, project_duration_months, and organization_type. Optionally specify staff_positions, equipment/travel needs, indirect_rate, cost_share_required, and multi_year options. The tool returns customized budget template.

budget_categories.description: Main budget categories appropriate for this grant and project type

suggested_allocations.description: Suggested percentage allocations for each budget category

required_cost_share.description: Required matching funds amount in USD if applicable

allowable_costs.description: List of allowable cost types for this grant

unallowable_costs.description: List of costs not allowed by this funder

budget_narrative_tips.description: Tips for writing effective budget justification narrative

yearly_breakdown.description: Year-by-year budget allocation if multi-year project
